org.gbif.ws.client

Class BaseWsGetClient<T,K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.ws.client.BaseWsClient
      • org.gbif.ws.client.BaseWsGetClient<T,K>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the main entity class

    public abstract class BaseWsGetClient<T,K>
extends BaseWsClient
    Base client providing a get by key method for a specific entity type T. The client applies a json media type and provides various convenience methods to execute CRUD requests and can be configured to work with authentication. The client can return other types than the main T class via generic types passed in.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        @Nullable
public T get(K key)
        Gets a resource by its key by executing a json type http GET request. The clients resourceClass is used to convert the response into an object.
        Returns:
        requested resource or null if it couldn't be found

      • get

        @Nullable
protected T get(String... path)
        Executes a json type http GET request with paths added to base resource. The clients resourceClass is used to convert the response into an object.
        Parameters:
        path - optional paths to be appended to the base resource
        Returns:
        requested resource or null

      • get

        @Nullable
protected T get(K key,
             Locale locale)
        Gets a resource by its key by executing a json type http GET request. Also applies a language http header. The clients resourceClass is used to convert the response into an object.
        Parameters:
        key - primary key for base resource class
        locale - identifier for a region
        Returns:
        requested resource or null
